_sText:
VERSION 2! http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/123508

Hello.

At first I wanna say that this is a remake of a map called "de_rantasauna", I'm terribly sorry, but I don't know the original creator, but credit's for him/her.

SPAWN POINTS
Terrorists spawn at the mountains and counter terrorists spawn from the main 
building.

OBJECTIVE
The basic idea is for the terrorists to plant the bomb on "sauna" area (A) on the map and completely ruin the nice vacation OR just kill everybody and take over.
Counter terrorists have to protect the sauna from demolition by all cost!

INFO
This map has alot of secret places all over the map, by mastering em, you have a advantage, such as invisible bridge, invisible walls, breakable walls etc...
Based on 8-8 matches, but holds 40 players limit, if you don't have any friends to play with, (or it's just me) don't you worry this map is bot friendly.

Enjoy!
